original_title: 担任教師の僕は生徒の誘惑に負けて放課後ラブホで何度も、何度も、セックスしてしまった
overview: Sakura’s teacher confesses her forbidden love to her. She took it well. Her amazing libido and size did the rest.
title: I Was Her Homeroom Teacher, But I Couldn’t Resist My Students Temptation… I Took Her To A Love Hotel After School And We Fucked Over And Over Again… Sakura Miura
